name: The Cherishing
description:
Your parents have locked you up in a tower in the hope that a valiant prince will come to save you. Save yourself from a loveless royal marriage by feeding the princes to the man eating plants and climbing out of the tower to freedom.

Credits:
* art: Andrew ( @triplevisgames )
* music: Patrick ( @Fat_Bard )
* code: Karlos ( @solkar )
